## EmscriptenDownloadMonitor class

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
class EmscriptenDownloadMonitor extends EventTarget
```

<b>Extends:</b> [EventTarget](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/EventTarget)

Monitors the download #progress of Emscripten modules

Usage:

```js
const downloadMonitor = new EmscriptenDownloadMonitor();
const php = await startPHP(phpLoaderModule, 'web', downloadMonitor.phpArgs);
downloadMonitor.addEventListener('#progress', (e) => {
	console.log(e.detail.#progress);
});
```
